questions.quote: I'm not bragging, I happen to have a very keen lesbian eye.  Hi, how ya doin.'
You're going to that again? Why? Just to do that stupid line?
I'm telling you the guy's a drunk, he's probably on a bender.
Well I was kind of, hehehe, short on material and I, um, I put them in the book anyway.
You couldn't pay me enough to go to the beach on a weekend. I mean it's hard enough...
No, sure sure, he wants to. It's very kind of you. Yeah, Jerry, he appreciates it. Don't you, Jerry?
I got rejected by a bald woman. A bald woman rejected me. Heh, you like that one? A woman with no prospects and no *hair*, told me that I wasn't her type. Apparently *baldy* likes a slimmer guy.
Hey, hey, hey.  I hear you've got some lip reader working for you. You gotta let me use her for one day. Just one day.
Well one day somebody's going to sleep on that thing and we'll get sued.Â  I hope this doctor knows what he's doing.
Hey look ,you know, you're the one who's locked out. I'm letting you stay here. You're wearing my bathrobe. You should adapt to me.
